title: Mindy Kaling poses in black bodysuit and posts to Instagram she's 'feeling like that b****'
text:
She's made a career about of her humor.

And on Tuesday, Mindy Kaling, 40, entertained her social media followers with a cheeky Instagram post.

Sitting on the floor in front of a mirror in her closet, the former star of The Office posed in a black bodysuit with the caption: 'Oh nothing, just feeling like that b****.'

Channeling Lizzo: Mindy Kaling, 40, posted cheeky Instagram Tuesday, sharing a closet selfie in which she wears a black bodysuit with the caption: 'Oh nothing, just feeling like that b****'

The actress, writer and producer showed off her bare legs in the snap taken with her cell phone.

Behind her, shoes, purses and clothing were arranged in sections of the walk-in closet.

The caption referenced lyrics in Lizzo's hit song Truth Hurts.

The Mindy Project star's last project was the Amazon Prime movie Late Night, which she wrote, produced and co-starred in with Emma Thompson.

Fan favorite: The Indian American actress got her break in the NBC sitcom The Office, pictured with co-stars Ellie Kemper, Brian Baumgartner and Kate Flannery in 2005

Mover and shaker: The Mindy Project star's most recent project was Amazon Prime movie Late Night, which she wrote, produced and co-starred in with Emma Thompson, pictured in May

She is currently in pre-production on a new series for Netflix that's based on her childhood.

Called Never Have I Ever, the comedy she is writing and producing revolves around a first generation Indian American teenage girl.

Meanwhile, Kaling continues to juggle her work with raising her daughter Katherine, known as Kit, who turns two in December.
description: The actress, writer and producer showed off her bare legs in the snap taken with her cell phone. The caption referenced lyrics in Lizzo's hit song Truth Hurts.
